verses.verse: אָ֚נָה <WH575> Where הָלַ֣ךְ <WH1980> gone דּוֹדֵ֔ךְ <WH1730> Whither is thy beloved הַיָּפָ֖ה <WH3303> O thou fairest בַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <WH802> ess אָ֚נָה <WH575> Where פָּנָ֣ה <WH6437> turned aside דוֹדֵ֔ךְ <WH1730> has your beloved וּנְבַקְשֶׁ֖נּוּ <WH1245> ? that we may seek עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

דּוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> My beloved יָרַ֣ד <WH3381> is gone down לְגַנּ֔וֹ <WH1588> into his garden לַעֲרוּג֖וֹת <WH6170> to the beds הַבֹּ֑שֶׂם <WH1314> of spices לִרְעוֹת֙ <WH7462> to feed בַּגַּנִּ֔ים <WH1588> in the gardens וְלִלְקֹ֖ט <WH3950> and to gather שֽׁוֹשַׁנִּֽים׃ <WH7799> lilies
אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am לְדוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> I [am] my beloved's וְדוֹדִ֣י <WH1730> and my beloved לִ֔י הָרֹעֶ֖ה <WH7462> [is] mine he feedeth בַּשּׁוֹשַׁנִּֽים׃ <WH7799> among the lilies ס

יָפָ֨ה <WH3303> Thou [art] beautiful אַ֤תְּ <WH859> you רַעְיָתִי֙ <WH7474> O my love כְּתִרְצָ֔ה <WH8656> as Tirzah נָאוָ֖ה <WH5000> comely כִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> as Jerusalem אֲיֻמָּ֖ה <WH366> terrible כַּנִּדְגָּלֽוֹת׃ <WH1713> as [an army] with banners

הָסֵ֤בִּי <WH5437> Turn away עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5869> thine eyes מִנֶּגְדִּ֔י <WH5048> for שֶׁ֥הֵ֖ם <WH1992> from me for they הִרְהִיבֻ֑נִי <WH7292> have overcome שַׂעְרֵךְ֙ <WH8181> me thy hair כְּעֵ֣דֶר <WH5739> [is] as a flock הָֽעִזִּ֔ים <WH5795> of goats שֶׁגָּלְשׁ֖וּ <WH1570> that appear מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> from Gilead

שִׁנַּ֙יִךְ֙ <WH8127> Thy teeth כְּעֵ֣דֶר <WH5739> [are] as a flock הָֽרְחֵלִ֔ים <WH7353> of sheep שֶׁעָל֖וּ <WH5927> which go up מִן־ <WH4480> up הָרַחְצָ֑ה <WH7367> from the washing שֶׁכֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> All מַתְאִימ֔וֹת <WH8382> whereof every one beareth twins וְשַׁכֻּלָ֖ה <WH7909> and [there is] not one barren אֵ֥ין <WH369> one בָּהֶֽם׃
כְּפֶ֤לַח <WH6400> As a piece הָרִמּוֹן֙ <WH7416> of a pomegranate רַקָּתֵ֔ךְ <WH7541> [are] thy temples מִבַּ֖עַד <WH1157> within לְצַמָּתֵֽךְ׃ <WH6777> thy locks

שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> There are threescore הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> There מְּלָכ֔וֹת <WH4436> queens וּשְׁמֹנִ֖ים <WH8084> and fourscore פִּֽילַגְשִׁ֑ים <WH6370> concubines וַעֲלָמ֖וֹת <WH5959> and virgins אֵ֥ין <WH369> without מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> without number

אַחַ֥ת <WH259> is [but] one הִיא֙ <WH1931> he יוֹנָתִ֣י <WH3123> My dove תַמָּתִ֔י <WH8535> my undefiled אַחַ֥ת <WH259> she [is] the [only] one הִיא֙ <WH1931> is her לְאִמָּ֔הּ <WH517> of her mother בָּרָ֥ה <WH1249> she [is] the choice הִ֖יא <WH1931> who לְיֽוֹלַדְתָּ֑הּ <WH3205> [one] of her that bare רָא֤וּהָ <WH7200> saw בָנוֹת֙ <WH1323> her The daughters וַֽיְאַשְּׁר֔וּהָ <WH833> her and blessed מְלָכ֥וֹת <WH4436> her [yea] the queens וּפִֽילַגְשִׁ֖ים <WH6370> and the concubines וַֽיְהַלְלֽוּהָ׃ <WH1984> and they praised ס

מִי־ <WH4310> Who זֹ֥את <WH2063> that הַנִּשְׁקָפָ֖ה <WH8259> Who [is] she [that] looketh forth כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> like שָׁ֑חַר <WH7837> as the morning יָפָ֣ה <WH3303> fair כַלְּבָנָ֗ה <WH3842> as the moon בָּרָה֙ <WH1249> clear כַּֽחַמָּ֔ה <WH2535> as the sun אֲיֻמָּ֖ה <WH366> [and] terrible כַּנִּדְגָּלֽוֹת׃ <WH1713> as [an army] with banners ס

אֶל־ <WH413> into גִּנַּ֤ת <WH1594> into the garden אֱגוֹז֙ <WH93> of nuts יָרַ֔דְתִּי <WH3381> I went down לִרְא֖וֹת <WH7200> to see בְּאִבֵּ֣י <WH3> the fruits הַנָּ֑חַל <WH5158> of the valley לִרְאוֹת֙ <WH7200> [and] to see הֲפָֽרְחָ֣ה <WH6524> flourished הַגֶּ֔פֶן <WH1612> whether the vine הֵנֵ֖צוּ <WH5132> budded הָרִמֹּנִֽים׃ <WH7416> [and] the pomegranates

לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> Or ever I was aware נַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> my soul שָׂמַ֔תְנִי <WH7760> made מַרְכְּב֖וֹת <WH4818> me [like] the chariots עַמִּי־ <WH5971> people נָדִֽיב׃ <WH5081> of my noble

שׁ֤וּבִי <WH7725> Return שׁ֙וּבִי֙ <WH7725> return הַשּׁ֣וּלַמִּ֔ית <WH7759> O Shulamite שׁ֥וּבִי <WH7725> return שׁ֖וּבִי <WH7725> return וְנֶחֱזֶה־ <WH2372> that we may look בָּ֑ךְ מַֽה־ <WH4100> Why תֶּחֱזוּ֙ <WH2372> upon thee What will ye see בַּשּׁ֣וּלַמִּ֔ית <WH7759> the Shulammite כִּמְחֹלַ֖ת <WH4246> the dance הַֽמַּחֲנָֽיִם׃ <WH4264> of two armies
